results.title: Vitamin D Status Determines Metformin Action on Gonadotropin Levels in Postmenopausal Women with Subclinical Hyperthyroidism.
results.text_hl: Background/Objectives: The gonadotropin-lowering effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ were found to be more pronounced in the case of coexisting @DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@ and absent in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Vitamin_D_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014808 @@@hypovitaminosis D.@@@ Thus, the aim of the current study was to determine whether @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@ status determines pituitary effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in individuals with @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Adenoma_Hyperfunctioning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566386 @@@thyroid hyperfunction@@@ and elevated gonadotropin levels.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Kowalcze K, Szkróbka W, Okopień B. Vitamin D Status Determines Metformin Action on Gonadotropin Levels in Postmenopausal Women with Subclinical Hyperthyroidism. Pharmaceutics. 2025 Mar 30;17(4):. PMID: 40284437
citations.BibTeX: @article{40284437, title={Vitamin D Status Determines Metformin Action on Gonadotropin Levels in Postmenopausal Women with Subclinical Hyperthyroidism.}, author={Krysiak R and Kowalcze K and Szkróbka W and Okopień B}, journal={Pharmaceutics}, volume={17}, number={4}}
